entry.title: Creating a basic Ubuntu Virtual Machine
entry.content:
Virtual Box setup
I don’t set up a virtual machine often enough to remember which options I want, or maybe I just have a poor memory. Either way, here are steps to create a simple Ubuntu virtual machine.
Basic Frame
In Oracle VirtualBox, select “New” and answer the prompts as described below....

entry.title: Example post
entry.content:
Introducing Flex, a Jekyll theme
Flex is a minimalist, responsive theme based on the website, The Development.
Open Sourced on GitHub
Flex is open sourced on GitHub and is licensed under the MIT License. Feel free to contribute to it anytime!
